name: Murgrik
movement: swim 40 ft., fly 20 ft., walk 40 ft.
description: Murgrik is a large, disturbing aberration with a remarkable capacity for movement, possessing multiple tentacles that allow it to fly and swim with ease.
memorable: Its unsettling ululations can frighten foes, and its ability to swallow smaller creatures makes it a relentless predator.
goals: Murgrik typically seeks to overpower and devour its prey, using psychological tactics to gain the upper hand in combat.
relations: Murgrik may be found lurking in dark, aquatic environments, possibly serving as a guardian for greater fiends or aberrations.
environment: Usually found in dark waters or environments that allow for quick movement and ambush tactics.
strengths: High mobility, blood frenzy increases attack efficiency against wounded foes, and powerful psychic attack.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma make it vulnerable in social situations and tactics that require clever negotiation.
attacks: Employs a vicious multiattack with a bite and tentacles, capable of grappling and swallowing smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Unsettling Ululations creates a fear-inducing wail that can damage and frighten multiple enemies around it.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting it advantage on perception checks relying on scent.
skills: Noteworthy in athletics and perception, making it capable of both physical pursuits and detection.
additional_information: Ability to hold breath underwater for up to 30 minutes.
Can swallow creatures it grapples, inflicting acid damage over time.
Blood frenzy grants advantage on attack rolls against wounded foes.
Tentacles can grapple and restrict movement of small or medium targets.
Possesses a significant physical power with a high strength score.
test_queries: flying creature that uses tentacles to attack
aquatic monster that swallows and restrains prey
psychic wailing monster with tentacle flight
large aberration with blood frenzy ability
fear inducing creature lurking in dark waters
